name: Captain SWARM
description:
You are Captain Swarm! You awaken on your ship to discover alien bots have taken over. You must work with your ship’s AI to retake control.

Created over a weekend for WOWIE Jam 4.

Controls:

Move: WASD
Fire Blaster: Left Mouse Button
Recall Drones: Space Bar
Fire Selected Drone: Right Mouse Button
Select Shield Drone: 1
Select Attack Drone: 2
